title: Salma Hayek, 53, shows off her curves in makeup-free bikini pic: 'You haven't aged a day'
text:
Salma Hayek’s turtle appreciation post just got upstaged — by the Oscar-nominated star’s bikini.

The 53-year-old actress — who triumphantly celebrated her most recent birthday with a jaw-dropping bikini photo — took to Instagram on Tuesday to gush about her love for “turtles on the beach.” Her smitten followers, however, couldn’t get past her curve-hugging, color-block bikini or her natural beauty.

Rocking beachy waves and posing seemingly makeup-free, Hayek was showered with praise from her loyal followers.

“You are and always will be one of the most beautiful woman on the planet!” raved a fan.

“Do you age?” wrote a commenter. “Been a fan since ‘Desperado.’ Saw you in ‘The Hitman’s Bodyguard,’ you haven't aged a day.”

“How do you keep looking so young??” asked another fan.

“Stunning!!!! Your light is undeniably bright!” gushed one commenter.

Another joked about the star’s Mexican roots.

“Beautiful women like Salma may make guys reconsider building the wall lol,” the commenter quipped.

Meanwhile, Hayek’s follower count continues to rise. Earlier this month, she posted a photo of her getting acupuncture in the nude to celebrate reaching 12 million followers.

description: "Beautiful women like Salma may make guys reconsider building the wall," one fan said of the Mexican star's stunning shoot.
